text: Muta'addid logoṅ kī sargoshiyāṅ mere kānoṅ tak pahuṅchtī haiṅ. Wuh kahte haiṅ, “Chāroṅ taraf dahshat hī dahshat? Yih kyā kah rahā hai? Us kī rapaṭ likhwāo! Āo, ham us kī riporṭ kareṅ.” Mere tamām nām-nihād dost is intazār meṅ haiṅ ki maiṅ phisal jāūṅ. Wuh kahte haiṅ, “Shāyad wuh dhokā khā kar phaṅs jāe aur ham us par ġhālib ā kar us se intaqām le sakeṅ.”
